Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: What a unique and great experience at this gem of a place, we sat down on the bottom floor right at the bar.  Friendly staff with a great ambiance my friends went too the rooftop for a smoke and I chilled while observing the going ons. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: I've missed travelling so much and I'm glad that there are places like this close by to remind us of good foreign food. If you looking for an amazing Ramen Pork Tonkotsu look no further. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text:
Incredible!!! Never knew this place existed and was pleasantly surprised.

The rooftop area is the best spot with an open area and closed area bar and ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: We went to the restaurant on the ground floor, next time we‚Äôll try also the bar at the top floor. Food was tasty and fun, we had lots of starters cause they sounded more interesting than the mains. Don‚Äôt miss the fries, the bao bun, the chicken skewer and the cheese cake.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Food was delicious! We tried the pork ramen and one of each dessert. Definitely worth the visit. Staff was friendly and service was fast. Going to visit again when we are in the area!

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Really great food. A good sense of true Japanese and a good mix of the chef's personal twist on things. You can tatse the passion investment in the food

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: This is the cutest little spot I tried out a while back. It‚Äôs truly a hidden gem the restaurant is called Torii it‚Äôs part of @tjingtjinghouse . Better known as tjingtjing the food is so fresh and I was mesmerized by the bright colors and ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Amazing experience for anyone looking to have great food and a wonderful time. Food is good, drinks are great and staff are extremely friendly.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: 3rd floor is a bar with lounge chairs inside and seating outside. Dimly lit with ambient lighting to set the mood, great for drinks before dinner. Staff are friendly and can make custom drinks on request, cocktails are quite pricey but ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: The food is truly unmatched!! Male waiters upstairs are a bit weird (like sneak their number on a napkin & when you don‚Äôt text them the next time you return they‚Äôll be very hostile). That aside, the food is truly amazing. Would be 5 stars if not for that x

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: The food will have you coming back while the service has you looking for the nearest door! ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text:
Lovely aesthetic and great vibe.
Loved their signature fries! ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Unique interior, amazing variety of delicious Japanese rice and noodle dishes üçúüçö Try the sake üç∂ an alcoholic fermented rice drink. Thank you, I'll defenitely come again!!! üáØüáµüèØ

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Food looked soooo good even though when we got there, the kitchen had closed. Wish we got there earlier. The drinks were delicious and vibe is awesome. I had the rooibos gin 10/10.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: I did not expect the amazing experience I had at Tjing Tjing. It's a beautiful, eclectic space filled with the perfect balance of stunning and quirky decor. The food will blow your mind (The fries may be the most delicious thing I've ever ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Quality / price is great. I'd recommend to take sushi in matcha with fish and rice balls! The music and atmosphere are great as well, especially in the late evening. A bit tricky to sit with a big group at small tables, but that's a minor issue

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Great experience, good authentic Japanese food. My only complaint is our waiter who was a bit all over the place. Also beware of the mochi ice cream as although the ice cream is good the mochi itself is definitely an acquired taste.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text:
Nice place, friendly service, and even moved us after asking because it was too hot at the top level!
Their food is also very good and beautifully presented, with reasonable prices.
A have-to-ty place for any Asian Food Lover!

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Surprisingly casual upstairs. Amazing cocktails, an outdoor smoking section and best bao buns. A really good vibe. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text:
Tjing Tjing Momiji was an exceptional experience.
From the food, to the ambience of the atmosphere. It was a very educational dining experience and one I'm not likely to forget any time soon!

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Great cocktails and very tasty food. We had some snack and drinks on the rooftop bar. The setting is quite cool. Service was unfortunately very slow.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: If I could I would award this restaurant 7 stars. We dined at Torii in Tjing Tjing house. Everything was absolutely amazing. The cocktails tasted fresh, flavourful and aromatic and the food was outstanding. Highly recommend the sesame broccoli. The cheesecake was one of the best in Cape Town.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Cocktails was great. Ambience is lovely. Unfortunately the service and the mains were lacking. Waitress brought starters and mains out at the same time. We waited on a table to open up on the rooftop, when it did, we went to sit down only ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: A must do Great menu rooftop awesome vibe and service, very safe setup

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Food tastes good. Setting is great. Friendly service.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: The best Japanese restaurant in South Africa. It's a total must. Authentically Japanese. The whole experience was amazing. Would definitely go back.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Looky here looky here, a Japanese restaurant! In a nice place in town. Oh, and let‚Äôs not forget about their roof top bar üòä ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Fast and friendly service, well presented portion of food, the vegeterian friendly side/tapas are great starters to share between two. Vegeterian Ramen was perfect consistency with the home made noodles. Nice chilled out atmosphere and funky Japanese setting. Will definitely be coming back.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Cool vibey spot on this little roof top bar. Fairly trendy crowd and music beats playing. Nice stop for pre or post dinner drinks, or even for dinner as they do have a Japanese themed menu.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Wow. Outstanding food and experience. Some unusual dishes accompanied by cards that add further story to the food. The last of the high end restaurants on our trip. We tried a lot. Including La Colombe. Easily top 3. A MUST try.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: This has been one of the best Asian Restaurants I've been too soo far. The vibe is absolutely fantastic. The Food is very good and the service is top class.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: I absolutely love this place, the quality of the food is amazing I was just really disappointed once, I went to get a take outta Mochi but they were closing ‚Äúthe door was still open thou‚Äô because I was flying back to Johannesburg, then they ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Amazing Japanese style food! Good reminder: take your time because you are probably gonna have to wait to get a table, but it‚Äôsw worth the wait

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Great Japanese food where we keep on coming back for that authentic street food type vibe and something different from the norm! Do yourself a favour and walk in (no reservations), you won't be disappointed!

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Tongkatsu ramen is incredibly flavourful, cocktails are excellent as well. It has a rooftop section for those hot nights in cape town.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Saturday, 2 October, we went to Tjing Tjing for a night of great dinning and cocktails. We left very disappointed and won‚Äôt be returning soon, if ever. At the entrance we were greeted by a very rude bouncer (not something you would expect ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Great starters/bites, ramen was okay-ish. Very homey and cosy inside feel and the roof top bar is a great addition before having supper. Your wait could become long depending on when you arrive as you can't make a reservation. Alcohol is rather pricey.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Tells my Partner and I that the bigger tables upstairs are reserved, even when clearly stating there are no reservations, and then allowing another couple 15mins later to sit at that bigger table just because no big group has arrived? ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: This was a good location with an awesome feel to it. Highly recommend if you are looking for a nice meet up with friends for a drink. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Some of the best Japanese food that I have had outside of Japan. Compliments to the chefs and staff. You guys rock. Really made my birthday dinner an awesome one.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Delicious Japanese food and cocktails! ü§§

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Nice restaurant but food is not really Japanese. The miso ramen had no miso in it, the noodles used were soba noodles and not ramen noodles, the gyoza were served in the sauce and not separately, my green tea was served in a normal tea cup with saucer...... If you really want to eat Japanese, I can't recommend it.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: I regularly frequent Tjing Tjing and have a variety of dishes at their floor level restaurant which are tasty and relatively well priced. They‚Äôre also really good at accommodating dietary concerns. Drinks at the bar have varied but I have had a few excellent ones in the rooftop bar and the middle space.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: A vibrant and modern take on the Asian experience. At times the vibe felt like a scene straight out of an amine or more specifically, that Frank Ocean Blonde Tribute video. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: The roof top bar's ambience takes me back to Japan. The lighting, drinks and food aee well balanced and care is taken to everything with amazing service.  Always a great experience

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: The best Japanese restaurant in Cape Town hands down. The variety of food is great and I work recommend the ramen. The upstairs bar also offers fantastic drinks.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Super trendy, good food and excellent service too! Please have their signature fries, it‚Äôs a must!! Thank me later üòÜ

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: If it wasn't for the good food and setting the outing would be the worst I have ever experienced. The waiters took long and was so disrespectful when they did arrive. I would say if you want a bite to eat for takeaways then it's a good ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Decor is beautiful, food is always on point, fresh and creative! If you looking for a place to Escape the world out there then this is the spot. Your tastebuds will remind you to go back for more.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: The service is an indisputable 5 stars. The ambiance and environment is quite the upmarket trendy Japanese restaurant as promised. There is however a trick to that. The parking and the waiting list... there's quite the wait for a table but ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: The best place I've eaten at in Cape Town! This is a culinary experience that you will never forget. With a menu championing a Japanese cuisine it will surely tantalize your tastebuds!

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: We went to the bottom restaurant Tjing Tjing Torii. The seats are a bit uncomfortable but it's really well decorated for the theme and the food is amazing! We tried the Miso Broccoli Sando Box, Mushroom steamed bun, Shiitake Gyoza (pan ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Good Japanese food (we ate lunch at tjing tjing torii). The ramen were very nice and my yakitori was well made. Nice IPA beer as well albeit a bit fruity.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Food was okay, service was terrible, waitresses were completely uninterested in helping customers and had little to no knowledge about the menu. Overall dining here makes one feel unwelcome.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Excellent excellent excellent food. Very reasonably priced (from a tourist POV). The service is top notch too. Must experience if you're in Cape Town.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Awesome vibe.  Great food.  Delicious cuisine Cocktails.  Cool rooftop vibes.  Nice decor.  Definitely recommended.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: The menu looks really boring and unappetizing. We almost left but my wife insisted that we at least order something. WOW!!!! The food is amazing, really tasty. You should go

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: In an empty restaurant we were given limited options of seating based on the size of our party, due to the fact that that other patrons [might] show up and need our space. Server was rude

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: My first time. Had a wonderful experience. Lovely food. Very tasty and prepared well. Restaurant offers different settings. Waitresses could be a tiny bit more attentive and friendlier though otherwise they did a good job. Will certainly go again!

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Grate place to dine, staff is friendly and welcoming, the menu is limited and the food is just good nothing extraordinary.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: We had dinner at tori, the food was nice, Vibe and service as well. But the food was too sweet and salty, which made it a bit heavy

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: What a great experience! In the heart of Cape Town city ‚Ä¶ it has a feel of New York off the street and has three levels of various experiences‚Ä¶ start casual dining at the bottom .. move to fine dining in the middle and a roof top bar with ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Such an awesome bar upstairs on the rooftop with delicious cocktails and scrumptious food! We went Friday straight after work and there were just a few people there, sitting in the sun with the mist spraying on us was a delight! We had the ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Loved the tapas the fries were amazing. Cocktails are pretty fun and tasty wow.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Food was amazing!! It was fresh with a lot of unique and powerful flavours! Loved the interiors, super cool! ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Totally disgusted with the bad customer service and attitude of staff. You managed to ruin a very special for a young lady and her friends celebrating her 21st birthday.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Loved the spirit of this place! Went for some cocktails on the top floor.... vibe was awesome!! Music was good.... and it has an open smoking section. The decor and general feeling is something to return to üòä

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Creative looking food that needs to be destroyed in your mouth and savoured by the tastebuds, my first experience has left me with a feeling that I should definitely come back again. The decor is funky with a Asian cartoons on the walls, ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Great food, I liked the dumplings.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Tjing Tjing has always been a favourite. The rooftop gets a little full but the vibe and cocktails are worth it. Recommended the Little Devil and Litchi Cocktails!

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Great night time bar under the roof of a 200-year old building. Urban patrons frequent the place and enjoy the creative cocktails or classic drinks. Great vibe in stunning setting.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Amazing experience at Tjing Tjing Momiji. Food and service was nothing short of incredible. Thank you to the entire team for an unforgettable eveningüëåüèº

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: What a cool place. The vibe is really great and the food looks absolutely fantastic. It tastes delicious too. Food beautifully presented. Mushroom dumplings were a real stand out. Thank you

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Wow is the first word that comes to mind when i think about my experience at tjing tjing. The food and drinks were incredible and arrived very quickly! Our waitress Logan was also exceptional. Will definitely be back!

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text:
A beautiful 3 level experience for any occasion, chilled Japanese dining, formal 8 course meal or roof top drinks after work.
The decor is Cape Town world class and speciality drinks are in keeping with ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Loved it. Waiter just seemed to be a bit all over the place however, we had a massive order.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: From the get go, I was excited to try this place and it did not dissapoint. The food and cocktails were absolutely amazing. Service was quick and staff were super friendly. Only thing that made me not stay longer was the airflow of the 1st ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: We were expecting roof view, but its nothing special over here. The staff is not professional and quite rude. The security named Jamie was not polite and humiliated us when we went outside to smoke with our cocktails.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Great bar area, I found the food to be OK. But awesome overall experience.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: The rooftop bar cocktails were good and food was good which we had a starters to dinner. We ate our mains at the restaurant Torii downstairs which was not enjoyable - food was not authentic Japanese or even street Japanese cuisine. The ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Pure deliciousness, pure joy. üôåüèªü§§üòç

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Was expecting more upmarket,  did not stay. But have heard really good reccomendations.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Interesting little restaurant with great decor, however the waiters do make you feel like you're being a bother whenever you ask for something or while you're waiting for a table. Customer service could definitely be improved. The chicken & ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: What a pleasant experience, from service to the drinks in food. It was my first time there tonight and I can't express how much I enjoyed it. Only thing i wish i had was our waitresses name that served us at the roof area. Blond streaks, ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Tjing Tjing has stood the test of time. I know it as one of the best cocktail bars in Cape Town, but the Japanese-themed restaurant is just as good. Excellent service, amazing decor and delicious food and drinks.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Unreal experience! Unbelievable food with a calming environment. The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful. They anticipated our every move and made us feel very special. I would highly recommended for a special occasion or a date

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Tjing Tjing is a gem. I never knew that a Japanese restaurant and bar was open in town until I went there with some colleagues. ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: The most amazing food the flavour combinations are perfect the presentation is amazing and the service is great

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Hi there, I went to the restaurant last night and i heard such great things about the restaurant, but i was super disappointed by the food and service. We had cocktails, lamb ramen and the japanese  cheesecake with  miso caramel. The food ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text:
Ate at Torii on the lower level.  Atmosphere was very relaxed and the food was really good.
We ordered a variety of dishes which included their ramen, dumplings, tempura mushrooms, rice bowl, pork buns, etc.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: One of my go-to places in Cape Town. The restaurant (1st floor) has amazing Japanese/fusion cuisine with manga-like ambience and 3rd floor has a rooftop bar with half open ceiling. The cocktails that they make are one of the best that I‚Äôve tasted so far.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Absolutely incredible food and experience. Truly authentic Japanese

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Great outside area and fun place. Just a shame we got there a bit late and they had to close.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Amazing vibe, food and service,  and plenty vegan options

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Loved the food, was a bit pricey but totally worth it, highly recommend the desserts so save space!

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Very disappointing Ramen. The broth tasted awful. My partner and myself were very upset and couldn't finish both of our bowls. I am a huge fan of Japanese cuisine and was really excited to try the ramen at Tjing Tjing but it was a complete ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Transported into Japan . Beautiful setup. Lovely food. Would highly recommend. Thanks team!

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Took my partner here for a dinner birthday Japanese treat and wow were we so happy we came here to eat! Amazing food, the best ramen noodle dish we have ever had and everything tasted so delicious! Highly recommend! They were extremely ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Went to the Momiji section for the 4 course meal. Was such fun and a great experience. Interesting food with beautiful attention to detail. We went to the rooftop bar for cocktails afterwards, which I also recommend.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: How disappointing... I was so excited to have the experience shown on the website. But when we got there, all the rooftop tables were full, eagerly to eat at this restaurant we decided to wait as there were people paying, we just wanted ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text:
A few notes for management...

The walk-in only system doesn't work... We were sent upstairs for a drink to ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: I actually went to Mochi Mochi and they ran out of space so Tjing Tjing offered us a table. DAMG I forgot how nice this place is to sit in, if I could spend a day people watching while reading it would be here! ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Definitely coming back, awesome wine list I must say.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text:
I've been here multiple times. I've been to the bar, fine dining and the casual restaurant.
The bar is really nice, it's a rooftop (half outside half inside) and they have ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Great Food, Great Vibe, Great Environment but not great service - the waitress my table had in the rooftop bar area was very unattentive, unwelcoming and got our order wrong - among other things. Will definitely go again for the food, and the vibe but I'll stay away from the bar area.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Not the best experience, we asked to be accommodated and manager agreed only to have the waitress telling us she can't and this was after an hour and we left

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: I would have loved to visit this place but was told that you cannot book and when I called in on Monday to ask if late afternoon Saturday would work for 2 people, I was told it wouldn't be a problem. Would be nice if you could book and not ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: I love the way it's 3 level from restaurant,fine dining to bar.If you are looking for an Asian kinda upscale vibe then this place is for you

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text:
I cannot be more pleased. Tjing Tjing is great in all aspects. We love their drinks, and the non alchohol cocktails are devine!
We keep going back for the delicious food. We did thecall in and collect, and what a treat. Such an easy and convenient process. This place is a must visit.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Love the ramen at this place. It's to die for. They also make great dim sum dumplings and a awesome cocktails. The venue has 3 levels. Which includes the old Japanese way of dining on the the low tables. The top floor has a fully functional bar that provides excellent service. Perfect for that after work drink

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Lovely experience! We visited on a cold rainy day and the food was the perfect match! Friendly staff, excellent food and amazing venue. You can clearly see the owners have put a good effort into every detail. Well done will definitely be coming back to have drinks on the rooftop bar

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Food was good expected a bit more for the price and place

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Excellent! The pork belly yakitori and donut style mochi are to die for.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: We were very very excited to have dinner at Tjing Tjing after reading the great reviews but unfortunately we were left disappointed. My "Arnold Palmer" was soda water with a dash of cherry flavor. The waiter could not understand the concept ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Delicious ramen and Japanese deserts.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Nice high-class rooftop bar in the city centre. They always have different cocktail specials, which keeps the bar lively. But be ready to put down a pretty penny. You may leave Tjing Tjing with a hole in your wallet, but it will have been ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Awesome food, friendly staff and a really cool atmosphere

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Really nice place to go for drinks. I love it for their unique cocktails. I had the Kasai as I love anything with chili and ginger and have found my favorite cocktail! Highly recommend! This place is great because of its city rooftop and ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text:
Hidden gem.
Awesome vibe, great food, good service.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Average place with a great range of decent cocktails. Good for a chilled afternoon drinks before a wild night out

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: The space is stunning, the food was good, my expectations might have been too high. I have just had better bao's from places like bao down.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Amazing experience! The food was outstanding. A very interesting and creative mix, beautifully crafted and presented by gracious, knowledgable staff. From the decor right down to the custom KitKats and the cocktail on the roof, a truly memorable evening. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Excellent atmosphere, situated in the heart of Cape Town. Located near a security point but vagrants are still prevalent.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Okay. Food was amazing. Their house wine was really well thought out and received and the branding makes you feel really welcome. There was a hair on one of the dishes though. They replaced the entire dish and it was super appreciated.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text:
Limted menu, moody Staff
Not worth the effort it took to look for parking

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: I cannot comment on the food but the drinks are fairly priced, it has a great vibe and rooftop bar usually has enough space to find a seat. Important to note however is that the bar does not offer any views over the city or ocean. Worth a visit though.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: The food was lovely, decor great, vibe awesome. However the waitress was quite flippant and didn't even say thank you, after the bill was settled by the barman. Her attention was clearly focused on a larger table, which is concerning as ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Great vibe and excellent service. Their rooftop bar serves some of the best cocktails in Cape Town. It's very popular on weekends and attracts a very trendy crowd. Good place to hang out and grab a drink with friends. The restaurant at the bottom serves some amazing dishes as well.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Authentic Japanese experience, great food, very friendly staff.... felt a little bit alienated( could feel myself and fellow associate being judged probably due to the color of our skin)

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: I want to give big thank you to all staff in Tjing Tjing for great services and food. Thank you all for taking time entertaining my daughter -Juliette and also made us tasty food tonight. We will come back and bring more friends here. We enjoyed our dinning experience so much. Thank you.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: A great place for people who are into Japanese culture and food. Though the food can't be exactly the same as the original versions, it sure comes close and gives you a good idea of what Japanese cuisine is like. This  place is split in ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: I absolutely love this place, one of the best Japanese restaurants in south africa.  Super affordable with spectacular foods.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: A great place to experience a slice of what Harajuku would be like. It's like a pop Japanese place. The cocktails are amazing. Go up to the roof top for some awesome views! Food portions are small so I would say go for cocktails and desert.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Had the most awesome experience, cocktail was zingy, food was delightful and service was great. Highly recommend üëå

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Great hip atmosphere with amazing Cocktails

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: One of the best rooftop bars you'll probably find in Cape town. It's not too fancy but really nice and intermate. They have craft beer on tap which is little rare depending on where you. Dont expect a pool on the rooftop but expect a good vibe. Doesnt disappoint

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Fantastic surprise, really good food and really good experience.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: I went to Tjing Tjing back in 2015 and again in 2019. The service remains wonderful! I especially like the cocktail menu which was retrofitted to the decor and ambiance. The different levels to the Bar with restaurant included is so fitting to spend a night out in Cape Town CBD.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Food below average. Ramen broth a bit bland.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: An excellent experience. The food was surprising and delightful. Some very unexpected dishes with little South African twists to Japanese cuisine. An excellent evening out.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: The bottom restaurant is fantastic. Great atmosphere and the Japanese theme is very nice. The food is delicious and not too pricey either. Also great rooftop bar. Highly recommend it

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Great vibe and setting. The food was good at the rooftop. I unfortunately only got to experience the rooftop and will definitely want to come back for the rest. Also sad that the shitake was finished. Hopefully next time.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Levels to the restaurant was interesting. I think that's the best I got. Smoking area had like what looked like a coffin which was weird.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Good customer service. Lovely design of the place. Acquired taste (Japanese food). Enjoyed it.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: We went for lunch on a hot day in Cape Town. The service was great, food was excellent for the most part although the pork Ramen I had lacked a bit of flavour. The restaurant itself could benefit from better air conditioning on hot days. Good for work lunches, or a casual lunch with mates.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Oscar in the lounge was awesome. First Love cocktail was a hit and he even assisted us in getting some wonderful Japanese dishes. I've now truely lived

Name: Tjing Tjing

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Amazing food and very reasonable prices for everything. Cocktails were so delicious too!

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Absolutely delicious. Highly recommend pork belly starter. the food is amazing. Definitely would go back. Best japanese in Cape Town, by far.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Best rooftop I've been to in the CBD. Like their Asian alcohol drinks and the design. They have a nice fireplace that looks like an old brick oven at the roof. This was quite helpful for cold evenings out

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Tjing Thing momiji has an incredible tasting menu with incredible wine and sake (rare to find good sake).  The staff are incredible and explain every dish, which is a tiny bit of heaven in every bite.  You will not be disappointed with a meal at Tjing Tjing Momiji!!

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: The restaurant has a rooftop bar which serves drinks. The barmen did not appear to have much awareness of who was waiting and were impossibly slow when I attempted to get a drink (the bar was moderately busy - 3 people to a barman) On our ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Amazing, will go back any opportunity I get.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Unfortunately I had to give it 3 stars instead of 4 because of their service. The venue and the cocktails deserve 4 stars but you either have to know one of the barmen or send a pretty girl otherwise you'll be ignored and wait forever to ‚Ä¶

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text:
This is a review for the downstairs restaurant.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: The prices for their quality is not reasonable at all however the general atmosphere is fine for a starting point for predrinks. The music is okay but needs to be more inclusive of their locals but great place for tourists.

Review Text: 3 restaurants in one - informal street food at the bottom, gourmet dining on the second floor and a rooftop bar. Authentic Japanese food and also with a South African twist

Review Text: This is one of the hidden gems in Cape Town. The stairs to the roof have many patrons sweating by the time they get to the top. I guess it also filters out those who aren't serious about good views and good vibes. The Bohemian-ish deco is ‚Ä¶

Review Text: I liked it a lot, the food I ordered was very tasteful and the place looked amazing. It's a out of this world experience? Not really. But it's a nice place to go to.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text:

Review Text: Had an amazing evening at Momiji, an experience nearing La Colombe standards and service for a lot less money.  The wagyu tongue is by far the best piece of meat I have ever eaten!  Don't let the cut put you off, it is amazing!!!  All courses were fantastic and the pairing was great.  I still dream of that wagyu tho

Review Text: The staff we met are so lovely and friendly, and the new decor is gorgeous, every floor has its own feel. The food is also really nice and came super fast for every course.

Review Text: The new restaurant on street level is cool. Food very tasty, good vibe - i's something new and fun. Service is very chilled. I don't mind that as it's Cape Town.

Review Text: Great little restaurant. Great quality food, every dish I tried and tasted was great. Only downside was the drinks were a little too pricey.

Review Text: I really enjoy their food. They have great ramen, deserts and unique options. There's also a bar upstairs.

Review Text: So when does a ‚Äúlitchi‚Äù martini ever have a cherry in it? I love my litchi martinis, this did not taste of litchi. Bar the whining freezer in the background that forced us to sit outside. Food was average, over cooked pork belly. Disappointing!

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Excellent service. Food was superb. A real dining experience

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Amazing experience! The food was outstanding. A very interesting and creative mix, beautifully crafted and presented by gracious, knowledgable staff. From the decor right down to the custom KitKats and the cocktail on the roof, a truly memorable evening. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: I went to Tjing Tjing back in 2015 and again in 2019. The service remains wonderful! I especially like the cocktail menu which was retrofitted to the decor and ambiance. The different levels to the Bar with restaurant included is so fitting to spend a night out in Cape Town CBD.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Creative dishes, seems to be authentic Japanese (I'm admittedly not an expert), very minimalistic, pared down decor, staff not particularly warm but chef and dessert chef clearly passionate about their work.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: The prices for their quality is not reasonable at all however the general atmosphere is fine for a starting point for predrinks. The music is okay but needs to be more inclusive of their locals but great place for tourists.

Name: Tjing Tjing
Review Text: Japanese atmosphere good food 8 courses each a spectacular taste sensation. Staff knowledgeable and friendly
